query: CREATE TABLE real_city ( pop			int4, cname		text, outline 	path )
expected: CREATE TABLE real_city (pop INT, cname TEXT, outline path)

query: ANALYZE real_city
SELECT * INTO TABLE ramp FROM ONLY road WHERE name ~ '.*Ramp'
expected: SELECT * INTO ramp FROM ONLY road WHERE name ~ '.*Ramp'

query: CREATE VIEW street AS SELECT r.name, r.thepath, c.cname AS cname FROM ONLY road r, real_city c WHERE c.outline ?# r.thepath
expected: CREATE VIEW street AS SELECT r.name, r.thepath, c.cname AS cname FROM ONLY road AS r, real_city AS c WHERE c.outline ?# r.thepath

query: CREATE VIEW iexit AS SELECT ih.name, ih.thepath, interpt_pp(ih.thepath, r.thepath) AS exit FROM ihighway ih, ramp r WHERE ih.thepath ?# r.thepath
expected: CREATE VIEW iexit AS SELECT ih.name, ih.thepath, interpt_pp(ih.thepath, r.thepath) AS exit FROM ihighway AS ih, ramp AS r WHERE ih.thepath ?# r.thepath

query: CREATE VIEW toyemp AS SELECT name, age, location, 12*salary AS annualsal FROM emp
expected: CREATE VIEW toyemp AS SELECT name, age, location, 12 * salary AS annualsal FROM emp

query: COMMENT ON VIEW noview IS 'no view'
COMMENT ON VIEW toyemp IS 'is a view'
COMMENT ON VIEW toyemp IS NULL
CREATE TABLE view_base_table (key int PRIMARY KEY, data varchar(20))
expected: CREATE TABLE view_base_table ("key" INT PRIMARY KEY, data VARCHAR(20))

query: CREATE VIEW key_dependent_view AS SELECT * FROM view_base_table GROUP BY key
expected: CREATE VIEW key_dependent_view AS SELECT * FROM view_base_table GROUP BY "key"

query: ALTER TABLE view_base_table DROP CONSTRAINT view_base_table_pkey
CREATE VIEW key_dependent_view_no_cols AS SELECT FROM view_base_table GROUP BY key HAVING length(data) > 0
expected: CREATE VIEW key_dependent_view_no_cols AS SELECT * FROM view_base_table GROUP BY "key" HAVING length(data) > 0

query: CREATE TABLE viewtest_tbl (a int, b int, c numeric(10,1), d text COLLATE "C")
expected: CREATE TABLE viewtest_tbl (a INT, b INT, c NUMERIC(10, 1), d TEXT COLLATE "C")

query: COPY viewtest_tbl FROM stdin
expected: COPY viewtest_tbl FROM STDIN

query: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW viewtest AS SELECT * FROM viewtest_tbl
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW viewtest AS SELECT * FROM viewtest_tbl WHERE a > 10
SELECT * FROM viewtest
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW viewtest AS SELECT a, b, c, d FROM viewtest_tbl WHERE a > 5 ORDER BY b DESC
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW viewtest AS SELECT a FROM viewtest_tbl WHERE a <> 20
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW viewtest AS SELECT 1, * FROM viewtest_tbl
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW viewtest AS SELECT a, b::numeric, c, d FROM viewtest_tbl
expected: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW viewtest AS SELECT a, CAST(b AS NUMERIC), c, d FROM viewtest_tbl

query: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW viewtest AS SELECT a, b, c::numeric(10,2), d FROM viewtest_tbl
expected: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW viewtest AS SELECT a, b, CAST(c AS NUMERIC(10, 2)), d FROM viewtest_tbl

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW viewtest AS SELECT a, b, c, d, 0 AS e FROM viewtest_tbl
DROP VIEW viewtest
DROP TABLE viewtest_tbl
CREATE SCHEMA temp_view_test CREATE TABLE base_table (a int, id int) CREATE TABLE base_table2 (a int, id int)
expected: CREATE SCHEMA temp_view_test CREATE TABLE base_table (a INT, id INT) CREATE TABLE base_table2 (a INT, id INT)

query: SET search_path TO temp_view_test, public
expected: SET search_path = 'temp_view_test', 'public'

query: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_table (a int, id int)
expected: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE temp_table (a INT, id INT)

query: CREATE VIEW v1 AS SELECT * FROM base_table
CREATE VIEW v1_temp AS SELECT * FROM temp_table
CREATE TEMP VIEW v2_temp AS SELECT * FROM base_table

query: CREATE VIEW temp_view_test.v2 AS SELECT * FROM base_table
CREATE VIEW temp_view_test.v3_temp AS SELECT * FROM temp_table
CREATE SCHEMA test_view_schema CREATE TEMP VIEW testview AS SELECT 1
expected: CREATE SCHEMA test_view_schema CREATE TEMPORARY VIEW testview AS SELECT 1

query: CREATE VIEW v3 AS SELECT t1.a AS t1_a, t2.a AS t2_a FROM base_table t1, base_table2 t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.id
expected: CREATE VIEW v3 AS SELECT t1.a AS t1_a, t2.a AS t2_a FROM base_table AS t1, base_table2 AS t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.id

query: CREATE VIEW v4_temp AS SELECT t1.a AS t1_a, t2.a AS t2_a FROM base_table t1, temp_table t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.id
expected: CREATE VIEW v4_temp AS SELECT t1.a AS t1_a, t2.a AS t2_a FROM base_table AS t1, temp_table AS t2 WHERE t1.id = t2.id

query: CREATE VIEW v5_temp AS SELECT t1.a AS t1_a, t2.a AS t2_a, t3.a AS t3_a FROM base_table t1, base_table2 t2, temp_table t3 WHERE t1.id = t2.id and t2.id = t3.id
expected: CREATE VIEW v5_temp AS SELECT t1.a AS t1_a, t2.a AS t2_a, t3.a AS t3_a FROM base_table AS t1, base_table2 AS t2, temp_table AS t3 WHERE t1.id = t2.id AND t2.id = t3.id

query: CREATE VIEW v4 AS SELECT * FROM base_table WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM base_table2)
CREATE VIEW v5 AS SELECT t1.id, t2.a FROM base_table t1, (SELECT * FROM base_table2) t2
expected: CREATE VIEW v5 AS SELECT t1.id, t2.a FROM base_table AS t1, (SELECT * FROM base_table2) AS t2

CREATE VIEW v7 AS SELECT * FROM base_table WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM base_table2)
CREATE VIEW v8 AS SELECT * FROM base_table WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1)
CREATE VIEW v6_temp AS SELECT * FROM base_table WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM temp_table)
CREATE VIEW v7_temp AS SELECT t1.id, t2.a FROM base_table t1, (SELECT * FROM temp_table) t2
expected: CREATE VIEW v7_temp AS SELECT t1.id, t2.a FROM base_table AS t1, (SELECT * FROM temp_table) AS t2

query: CREATE VIEW v8_temp AS SELECT * FROM base_table WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM temp_table)
CREATE VIEW v9_temp AS SELECT * FROM base_table WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM temp_table)
CREATE VIEW v10_temp AS SELECT * FROM v7_temp
CREATE VIEW v11_temp AS SELECT t1.id, t2.a FROM base_table t1, v10_temp t2
expected: CREATE VIEW v11_temp AS SELECT t1.id, t2.a FROM base_table AS t1, v10_temp AS t2

query: CREATE VIEW v12_temp AS SELECT true FROM v11_temp
expected: CREATE VIEW v12_temp AS SELECT TRUE FROM v11_temp

query: CREATE TABLE t1 (num int, name text)
expected: CREATE TABLE t1 (num INT, name TEXT)

query: CREATE TABLE t2 (num2 int, value text)
expected: CREATE TABLE t2 (num2 INT, value TEXT)

query: CREATE TEMP TABLE tt (num2 int, value text)
expected: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tt (num2 INT, value TEXT)

query: CREATE VIEW nontemp1 AS SELECT * FROM t1 CROSS JOIN t2
expected: CREATE VIEW nontemp1 AS SELECT * FROM t1 INNER JOIN t2 ON TRUE

query: CREATE VIEW temporal1 AS SELECT * FROM t1 CROSS JOIN tt
expected: CREATE VIEW temporal1 AS SELECT * FROM t1 INNER JOIN tt ON TRUE

query: CREATE VIEW nontemp2 AS SELECT * FROM t1 INNER JOIN t2 ON t1.num = t2.num2
CREATE VIEW temporal2 AS SELECT * FROM t1 INNER JOIN tt ON t1.num = tt.num2

expected: CREATE VIEW nontemp3 AS SELECT * FROM t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN t2 ON t1.num = t2.num2

query: CREATE VIEW temporal3 AS SELECT * FROM t1 LEFT JOIN tt ON t1.num = tt.num2
expected: CREATE VIEW temporal3 AS SELECT * FROM t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN tt ON t1.num = tt.num2

expected: CREATE VIEW nontemp4 AS SELECT * FROM t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN t2 ON t1.num = t2.num2 AND t2.value = 'xxx'

query: CREATE VIEW temporal4 AS SELECT * FROM t1 LEFT JOIN tt ON t1.num = tt.num2 AND tt.value = 'xxx'
expected: CREATE VIEW temporal4 AS SELECT * FROM t1 LEFT OUTER JOIN tt ON t1.num = tt.num2 AND tt.value = 'xxx'

SELECT relname FROM pg_class WHERE relname LIKE 'temporal%' AND relnamespace IN (SELECT oid FROM pg_namespace WHERE nspname LIKE 'pg_temp%') ORDER BY relname
CREATE TABLE tbl1 ( a int, b int)
expected: CREATE TABLE tbl1 (a INT, b INT)

query: CREATE TABLE tbl2 (c int, d int)
expected: CREATE TABLE tbl2 (c INT, d INT)

query: CREATE TABLE tbl3 (e int, f int)
expected: CREATE TABLE tbl3 (e INT, f INT)

query: CREATE TABLE tbl4 (g int, h int)
expected: CREATE TABLE tbl4 (g INT, h INT)

query: CREATE TEMP TABLE tmptbl (i int, j int)
expected: CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE tmptbl (i INT, j INT)

query: CREATE   VIEW  pubview AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE tbl1.a BETWEEN (SELECT d FROM tbl2 WHERE c = 1) AND (SELECT e FROM tbl3 WHERE f = 2) AND EXISTS (SELECT g FROM tbl4 LEFT JOIN tbl3 ON tbl4.h = tbl3.f)
expected: CREATE VIEW pubview AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE tbl1.a BETWEEN (SELECT d FROM tbl2 WHERE c = 1) AND (SELECT e FROM tbl3 WHERE f = 2) AND EXISTS (SELECT g FROM tbl4 LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl3 ON tbl4.h = tbl3.f)

query: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_class where relname = 'pubview' AND relnamespace IN (SELECT OID FROM pg_namespace WHERE nspname = 'testviewschm2')
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pg_class WHERE relname = 'pubview' AND relnamespace IN (SELECT oid FROM pg_namespace WHERE nspname = 'testviewschm2')

query: CREATE   VIEW  mytempview AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE tbl1.a BETWEEN (SELECT d FROM tbl2 WHERE c = 1) AND (SELECT e FROM tbl3 WHERE f = 2) AND EXISTS (SELECT g FROM tbl4 LEFT JOIN tbl3 ON tbl4.h = tbl3.f) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT g FROM tbl4 LEFT JOIN tmptbl ON tbl4.h = tmptbl.j)
expected: CREATE VIEW mytempview AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE tbl1.a BETWEEN (SELECT d FROM tbl2 WHERE c = 1) AND (SELECT e FROM tbl3 WHERE f = 2) AND EXISTS (SELECT g FROM tbl4 LEFT OUTER JOIN tbl3 ON tbl4.h = tbl3.f) AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT g FROM tbl4 LEFT OUTER JOIN tmptbl ON tbl4.h = tmptbl.j)

query: SELECT count(*) FROM pg_class where relname LIKE 'mytempview' And relnamespace IN (SELECT OID FROM pg_namespace WHERE nspname LIKE 'pg_temp%')
expected: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM pg_class WHERE relname LIKE 'mytempview' AND relnamespace IN (SELECT oid FROM pg_namespace WHERE nspname LIKE 'pg_temp%')

query: CREATE VIEW mysecview1 AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a = 0
CREATE VIEW mysecview2 WITH (security_barrier=true) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a > 0
expected: CREATE VIEW mysecview2 WITH ( security_barrier = 'true') AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a > 0

query: CREATE VIEW mysecview3 WITH (security_barrier=false) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a < 0
expected: CREATE VIEW mysecview3 WITH ( security_barrier = 'false') AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a < 0

query: CREATE VIEW mysecview4 WITH (security_barrier) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a <> 0
expected: CREATE VIEW mysecview4 WITH ( security_barrier) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a <> 0

query: CREATE VIEW mysecview5 WITH (security_barrier=100) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a > 100
expected: CREATE VIEW mysecview5 WITH ( security_barrier = 100) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a > 100

query: CREATE VIEW mysecview6 WITH (invalid_option) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a < 100
expected: CREATE VIEW mysecview6 WITH ( invalid_option) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a < 100

query: CREATE VIEW mysecview7 WITH (security_invoker=true) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a = 100
expected: CREATE VIEW mysecview7 WITH ( security_invoker = 'true') AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a = 100

query: CREATE VIEW mysecview8 WITH (security_invoker=false, security_barrier=true) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a > 100
expected: CREATE VIEW mysecview8 WITH ( security_invoker = 'false', security_barrier = 'true') AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a > 100

query: CREATE VIEW mysecview9 WITH (security_invoker) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a < 100
expected: CREATE VIEW mysecview9 WITH ( security_invoker) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a < 100

query: CREATE VIEW mysecview10 WITH (security_invoker=100) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a <> 100
expected: CREATE VIEW mysecview10 WITH ( security_invoker = 100) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a <> 100

query: SELECT relname, relkind, reloptions FROM pg_class WHERE oid in ('mysecview1'::regclass, 'mysecview2'::regclass, 'mysecview3'::regclass, 'mysecview4'::regclass, 'mysecview7'::regclass, 'mysecview8'::regclass, 'mysecview9'::regclass) ORDER BY relname
expected: SELECT relname, relkind, reloptions FROM pg_class WHERE oid IN (CAST('mysecview1' AS regclass), CAST('mysecview2' AS regclass), CAST('mysecview3' AS regclass), CAST('mysecview4' AS regclass), CAST('mysecview7' AS regclass), CAST('mysecview8' AS regclass), CAST('mysecview9' AS regclass)) ORDER BY relname

expected: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW mysecview3 WITH ( security_barrier = 'true') AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a < 256

query: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW mysecview4 WITH (security_barrier=false) AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a <> 256

query: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW mysecview7 AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a > 256

expected: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW mysecview8 WITH ( security_invoker = 'true') AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a < 256

expected: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW mysecview9 WITH ( security_invoker = 'false', security_barrier = 'true') AS SELECT * FROM tbl1 WHERE a <> 256

query: CREATE VIEW tt1 AS SELECT * FROM ( VALUES ('abc'::varchar(3), '0123456789', 42, 'abcd'::varchar(4)), ('0123456789', 'abc'::varchar(3), 42.12, 'abc'::varchar(4)) ) vv(a,b,c,d)

query: create view tt201v as select ('2022-12-01'::date + '1 day'::interval) at time zone 'UTC' as atz, extract(day from now()) as extr, (now(), '1 day'::interval) overlaps (current_timestamp(2), '1 day'::interval) as o, 'foo' is normalized isn, 'foo' is nfkc normalized isnn, normalize('foo') as n, normalize('foo', nfkd) as nfkd, overlay('foo' placing 'bar' from 2) as ovl, overlay('foo' placing 'bar' from 2 for 3) as ovl2, position('foo' in 'foobar') as p, substring('foo' from 2 for 3) as s, substring('foo' similar 'f' escape '#') as ss, substring('foo' from 'oo') as ssf, trim(' ' from ' foo ') as bt, trim(leading ' ' from ' foo ') as lt, trim(trailing ' foo ') as rt, trim(E'\\000'::bytea from E'\\000Tom\\000'::bytea) as btb, trim(leading E'\\000'::bytea from E'\\000Tom\\000'::bytea) as ltb, trim(trailing E'\\000'::bytea from E'\\000Tom\\000'::bytea) as rtb, CURRENT_DATE as cd, (select * from CURRENT_DATE) as cd2, CURRENT_TIME as ct, (select * from CURRENT_TIME) as ct2, CURRENT_TIME (1) as ct3, (select * from CURRENT_TIME (1)) as ct4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP as ct5, (select * from CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) as ct6, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP (1) as ct7, (select * from CURRENT_TIMESTAMP (1)) as ct8, LOCALTIME as lt1, (select * from LOCALTIME) as lt2, LOCALTIME (1) as lt3, (select * from LOCALTIME (1)) as lt4, LOCALTIMESTAMP as lt5, (select * from LOCALTIMESTAMP) as lt6, LOCALTIMESTAMP (1) as lt7, (select * from LOCALTIMESTAMP (1)) as lt8, CURRENT_CATALOG as ca, (select * from CURRENT_CATALOG) as ca2, CURRENT_ROLE as cr, (select * from CURRENT_ROLE) as cr2, CURRENT_SCHEMA as cs, (select * from CURRENT_SCHEMA) as cs2, CURRENT_USER as cu, (select * from CURRENT_USER) as cu2, USER as us, (select * from USER) as us2, SESSION_USER seu, (select * from SESSION_USER) as seu2, SYSTEM_USER as su, (select * from SYSTEM_USER) as su2
expected: CREATE VIEW tt201v AS SELECT timezone('UTC', (CAST(CAST('2022-12-01' AS DATE) + '1 day' AS INTERVAL))) AS atz, extract(day FROM NOW()) AS extr, overlaps(NOW(), CAST('1 day' AS INTERVAL), CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(2), CAST('1 day' AS INTERVAL)) AS o, 'foo' is normalized AS isn, 'foo' is NFKC normalized AS isnn, normalize('foo') AS n, normalize('foo', NFKD) AS nfkd, overlay('foo' placing 'bar' from 2) AS ovl, overlay('foo' placing 'bar' from 2 for 3) AS ovl2, POSITION('foo' IN 'foobar') AS p, SUBSTRING('foo' FROM 2 FOR 3) AS s, SUBSTRING('foo' FROM 'f' FOR '#') AS ss, SUBSTRING('foo' FROM 'oo') AS ssf, trim(' foo ', ' ') AS bt, ltrim(' foo ', ' ') AS lt, rtrim(' foo ') AS rt, trim(CAST('\000Tom\000' AS BYTEA), CAST('\000' AS BYTEA)) AS btb, ltrim(CAST('\000Tom\000' AS BYTEA), CAST('\000' AS BYTEA)) AS ltb, rtrim(CAST('\000Tom\000' AS BYTEA), CAST('\000' AS BYTEA)) AS rtb, CURRENT_DATE AS cd, (SELECT * FROM CURRENT_DATE) AS cd2, CURRENT_TIME AS ct, (SELECT * FROM CURRENT_TIME) AS ct2, CURRENT_TIME(1) AS ct3, (SELECT * FROM CURRENT_TIME(1)) AS ct4, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS ct5, (SELECT * FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) AS ct6, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(1) AS ct7, (SELECT * FROM CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(1)) AS ct8, LOCALTIME AS lt1, (SELECT * FROM LOCALTIME) AS lt2, LOCALTIME(1) AS lt3, (SELECT * FROM LOCALTIME(1)) AS lt4, LOCALTIMESTAMP AS lt5, (SELECT * FROM LOCALTIMESTAMP) AS lt6, LOCALTIMESTAMP(1) AS lt7, (SELECT * FROM LOCALTIMESTAMP(1)) AS lt8, CURRENT_CATALOG AS ca, (SELECT * FROM CURRENT_CATALOG) AS ca2, CURRENT_ROLE AS cr, (SELECT * FROM CURRENT_ROLE) AS cr2, CURRENT_SCHEMA AS cs, (SELECT * FROM CURRENT_SCHEMA) AS cs2, CURRENT_USER AS cu, (SELECT * FROM CURRENT_USER) AS cu2, USER AS us, (SELECT * FROM USER) AS us2, SESSION_USER AS seu, (SELECT * FROM SESSION_USER) AS seu2, SYSTEM_USER AS su, (SELECT * FROM SYSTEM_USER) AS su2

expected: SELECT pg_get_viewdef('tt201v', TRUE)

query: create view tt26v as select x + y + z as c1, (x * y) + z as c2, x + (y * z) as c3, (x + y) * z as c4, x * (y + z) as c5, x + (y + z) as c6, x + (y # z) as c7, (x > y) AND (y > z OR x > z) as c8, (x > y) OR (y > z AND NOT (x > z)) as c9, (x,y) <> ALL (values(1,2),(3,4)) as c10, (x,y) <= ANY (values(1,2),(3,4)) as c11 from (values(1,2,3)) v(x,y,z)
expected: CREATE VIEW tt26v AS SELECT x + y + z AS c1, (x * y) + z AS c2, x + (y * z) AS c3, (x + y) * z AS c4, x * (y + z) AS c5, x + (y + z) AS c6, x + (y # z) AS c7, (x > y) AND (y > z OR x > z) AS c8, (x > y) OR (y > z AND NOT (x > z)) AS c9, (x, y) <> ALL (VALUES (1, 2), (3, 4)) AS c10, (x, y) <= ANY (VALUES (1, 2), (3, 4)) AS c11 FROM (VALUES (1, 2, 3)) AS v(x, y, z)

query: select pg_get_viewdef('tt26v', true)
